body:
Going to keep this PR continuously updated.

cc @fanquake @jarolrod @luke-jr @wtogami
This chunk can be reverted. The previous translation was fine, and it even translated "legacy" in the inheritance sense. Seems like a poor automatic translation.
diff_hunk:
@@ -72,8 +72,8 @@
     <message>
         <source>These are your Bitcoin addresses for receiving payments. Use the 'Create new receiving address' button in the receive tab to create new addresses.
 Signing is only possible with addresses of the type 'legacy'.</source>
-        <translation type="unfinished">Ce sont vos adressesÂ Bitcoin pour recevoir des paiements. Utilisez le bouton Â«Â CrÃ©er une nouvelle adresse de rÃ©ceptionÂ Â» dans lâonglet Recevoir afin de crÃ©er de nouvelles adresses.
-Il nâest possible de signer quâavec les adresses de type Â«Â legacyÂ Â».</translation>
+        <translation type="unfinished">Il s'agit de vos adresses Bitcoin pour la rÃ©ception des paiements. Utilisez le bouton "CrÃ©er une nouvelle adresse de rÃ©ception" dans l'onglet "Recevoir" pour crÃ©er de nouvelles adresses.
+La signature n'est possible qu'avec les adresses de type "patrimoine".</translation>

body:
Hahaha you guys must have fun reading translations in your own language too. Not sure we should try to translate those, but if we need to i guess keeping the original name would be more helpful.

> Exception "runaway"
diff_hunk:

         <source>Runaway exception</source>
-        <translation type="unfinished">Exception fugitive</translation>
+        <translation type="unfinished">Exception excessive</translation>

body:
@darosior 

> Went through the french diff, mostly good and nothing insane. some things, like errors, are probably not worth translating: it's awkward and not understandable to user anyways, it's just supposed to be pasted in a bug report i guess? (And if translated it will be harder to debug for those treating the bug report)

This PR just pulls translations from Transifex website using a script (no manual interaction). To amend or discuss particular translated strings, it would better to use Transifex directly.

EDIT: If you have any questions about using of Transifex website, don't hesitate to ask me about them.

Updated d348fb49ed1f71cf2013907958819b41796b2528 -> 69334a00a6b986c9b6be6257bcbd85df0c752b89 ([pr26141.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.01) -> [pr26141.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.01..pr26141.02)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

Updated 69334a00a6b986c9b6be6257bcbd85df0c752b89 -> efa4e3b71fa23d90974dca7c8b7b01eaa1600be2 ([pr26141.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.02) -> [pr26141.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.03), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.02..pr26141.03)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

Updated efa4e3b71fa23d90974dca7c8b7b01eaa1600be2 -> a0d5e395319f0cb1a299e6c7579ec7e886b30e17 ([pr26141.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.03) -> [pr26141.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.04), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.03..pr26141.04)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

Updated a0d5e395319f0cb1a299e6c7579ec7e886b30e17 -> d6dc3cb9d63a3595c3a76c0c8884c712ef6237ca ([pr26141.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.04) -> [pr26141.05](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.05), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.04..pr26141.05)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website
If there are any more changes can you pull them in here. Planning on merging this shortly.
